entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 3:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

Temperature: 8.8°C

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 91 %

Air Quality Health Index: 1
